pagesViewed.title: What is the number of pages viewed?
pagesViewed.text: The user journey, after identifying user needs, is the second crucial point in eco-design. The shorter the journey, between the user and the content or service for which they came, the more it reduces the ecological impact. In 2021, the average size of a web page is 2.1MB (compared to 0.013MB in 1995).

technical.title: Technical information
technical.text: Because 1 KWh produced in China by a coal-fired power plant emits 1Kg of CO2-eq, i.e. 10x more than in France by a nuclear power plant and 5x more on average than an OECD country.

calculated.title: How is this data calculated?
text: Life cycle analysis is a standardized assessment method for carrying out a multi-criteria and multi-stage environmental assessment of a system over its entire life cycle.

The number of visitors per month allows us to know the quantity of user terminals, network equipment, servers necessary to consult the content or services that you deliver. If you do not know it, you can find this information in your Google Analytics tool or equivalent.

The time that users spend on your digital service allows us to know the quantity of terminals, network equipment, servers necessary to serve, transit and consult the content or services that you deliver.
The conditions of use of your digital service, on the move or in the office, have very different impacts.

Calculated from an average PUE (Power Usage Effectiveness) of a server (i.e. 1.8). If you have opted for “green” hosting, you will be better than the market average on this parameter. Count the production servers, staging, review, CDN, etc.
